About Me

BIO

My name is Bonaventure Ndicunguye, I am a Full Stack Web Developer with a background in Banking. Effective at combining creativity and problem solving to develop user-friendly applications. Known among staff for attention to detail no matter the complexity of the project. I believe that there is always room for self-improvement both personally and professionally, I have qualities to bring to the work place such as good team work, organizational skills, efficiency and I am very meticulous, I show pride in all the work I do, I work well under pressure and I love a challenge. I posses excellent verbal and written communication skills and am able to relate to a wide range of people.
